Detailed Description

Advance Display Params for the LCD overlays(LCD1,LCD2,LCD3) .

struct Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig

Field Documentation

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::buffHandCheck

Controls the handscheck between the DMA buffer and the STALL signal to prevent from underflow. The bit must be set to 0 when the module is not in STALL mode.TODO-Check if we need to expose

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::fidFirst

Selects the first field to output in case of interlace mode. In case of progressive mode, the value is not used. For valid values check TODO.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::mono8bit

Mono 8-bit mode of the LCD, For valid values TODO

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::monoColor

Monochrome/color selection for the LCD.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::stallModeEnable

STALL mode for the LCD output. FALSE: Normal mode selected TRUE: STALL mode selected. The display controller sends the data without considering the VSYNC/HSYNC. The LCD output is disabled at the end of the transfer of the frame. Software must reenable the LCD output to generate a new frame. STALL mode is currently not used.

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::stnTft

LCD Display type of the LCD output, for valid values TODO

UInt32 Vps_DssDispcLcdAdvDisplayConfig::vencId

VencID of the panel to which this config is to be done.
